# Executive Summary

# Introduction

We analyze [data extracted from the 1974 Motor Trend magazine describing fuel consumption and 10 aspects of automobile design and performance for 32 automobiles (1973â€“74 models)](http://www.mortality.org/INdb/2008/02/12/8/document.pdf) to explore the following:

* Question: Is an automatic or manual transmission better for MPG?
* Quantify: The MPG difference between automatic and manual transmissions.
* Explore: The relationship between miles per gallon and the other parameters in the data set.

# The Relationship Between Fuel Efficiency and Other Parameters
